text: Matt Swider Sure, Cyber Monday 2018 is over, but plenty of US retailers have kept their price drops on electronics from the weekend - and are even introducing new deals. It's being dubbed'Cyber Monday Week ', which doesn't make too much sense, if we're honest. What does make a lot of sense? The deep discounts. We expect savings to continue on everything from 4KTVs, laptops, hard drives and phones to all other tech - related odds and ends. It may stay that way until Christmas, as stores attempt to sell off lots of their inventory. Of course, as Cyber Monday Week passes, deals will come and go.
